LanguageData.RK_Dagger.label: Ratkin dagger
LanguageData.RK_Dagger.description: A cute little dagger. It's light and fast, but the blade is very short. The handle is too small for human use.
LanguageData.RK_Dagger.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Dagger.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.label: Ratkin one-handed sword
LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.description: A one-handed sword with a perfectly balanced blade. The handle is too small for human use.
LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.tools.2.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Mace.label: Ratkin mace
LanguageData.RK_Mace.description: A mace with a perfecty balanced head. The handle is too small for human use.
LanguageData.RK_Mace.tools.0.label: Head
LanguageData.RK_Mace.tools.1.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_LightLance.label: Ratkin wooden lance
LanguageData.RK_LightLance.description: A wooden lance that can be improved by adding a metal tip. Unskilled wielders will have a difficult time hitting their target. The handle is too small for human use.
LanguageData.RK_LightLance.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_LightLance.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.RK_LightLance.tools.2.label: shaft
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.label: Ratkin two handed sword
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.description: A long, heavy two-handed sword. A skilled Ratkin warrior could easily cleave their enemy in half with this weapon.
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.label: Ratkin heavy lance
LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.description: A heavy metal lance. It can penetrate thick armor. Unskilled wielders will have a difficult time hitting their target. The handle is too small for human use.
LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.tools.2.label: shaft
